A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie feels even more JJ Abrams-y than the last one even though he didn't direct it. Cringey comedy\, Harry Potterish characters and the best parts of the movie were quickly ruined. I was most worried about Mark Hamill`s acting but it was the best part of the movie. Script was horrible\, nothing even happened in the movie that moved the narrative forward. Worst of all it just wasn't star wars.  Extremely disappointed.
